name: fishing Shark Hunting Game
description:
Shark Hunting Game

Save the shark from the traps of humans..You are suzhy , the bravest shark who happened to escape from a science facility.
This simple but addictive shooting game is easy but so funny to play. It reminds you nostalgic duck hunting games. Develop shooting
skills by aim and firing the fast moving sharks.
Choose your favourite gun hunt a shark before it can goes into the water,tilt your device and aim the shark after taking a perfect aim
shoot them and get a points,share your score with your friends and family and make a lot's of fun.
Be the best shark hunter on the sea.
this game includes a lot's of guns,HD Graphics.and many more things download this game and fulfil your interest.

Key features:

- Free shooting game
- A different version of duck hunter games
- Simple but funny gameplay
